title: 188. Gus Gordon with Felice Arena: Finding Francois
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary: Author and artist Gus Gordon chats to Dani Vee and guest cohost children' author Felice Arena. We chat about illustrating, art, Paris, finding the heart of a book, and Felice gives Gus a quiz about France.
